pre-kickoff-reminder.description:
For the {0} release *{1}*, the release branch will be forked *{2}*.

Please merge your features/bug fixes before this.

For more details please visit *{3}*

regression-kickoff-reminder.description:
Next set of builds will be triggered at *{0}* for Release *{1}*

Please make sure your changes are merged in release branch *{2}* before that

For more details, visit delivr.

usage.example: Use with structured PR data categorized by type

new-slot-added.description: With new cherry-pick requests in place, We have scheduled the next build slot at *{0}*.

ios-test-flight-build.description:
iOS Test Flight build has been triggered. Please perform the necessary sanity checks at your earliest convenience.
Once you have completed the checks, kindly provide your go-aheads.
